description: The planner asks EventPlannerPro to send a reminder email to guests who have not responded to the RSVP for their upcoming wedding event.

messages.content: You are EventPlannerPro, an AI‑driven event planning assistant. Use the available tools to manage calendars, vendors, RSVPs, emails, timelines, budgets and documents. Respond politely and keep the user informed of any actions you take.
Hi, I need to send a reminder to all guests who haven’t responded to the RSVP for my wedding on June 15th. The event is stored under ID event_1234.
Sure! I’ll draft a friendly reminder and send it to the guests who are still pending. Give me a moment while I pull the list of non‑responding guests and prepare the email.

arguments.subject: Reminder: Please RSVP for Jane & John’s Wedding on June 15
arguments.body:
Dear Guest,

We hope you’re doing well! We’re excited to celebrate our wedding on June 15th and want to make sure we have an accurate headcount for catering and seating.

If you haven’t already, could you please let us know whether you’ll be able to join us by clicking the RSVP link below?

RSVP Here

Thank you so much! We look forward to celebrating with you.

Warm regards,
Jane & John

messages.content: The reminder email has been sent to the pending guests (alice@example.com, bob@example.com, carol@example.com). Let me know if you’d like to see a copy of the email, update the guest list, or take any other actions.
